online.description: Prospective students can apply online through the university's official website. They need to create an account, fill out the electronic application form, and upload all required documents, such as academic transcripts, letters of recommendation, and a personal statement. The online application provides a convenient and efficient way to apply from anywhere with an internet connection.
online.deadline: The online application deadline for the Fall term is November 15, 2023, and for the Spring term is March 15, 2024.

offline.description: For applicants who prefer the traditional paper-based application process, they can obtain the physical application form from the admissions office on the university campus. After filling out the form with accurate information and attaching the required documents, they can submit the completed application package in person or send it by mail to the admissions office address.
offline.deadline: The offline application deadline for the Fall term is November 30, 2023, and for the Spring term is April 30, 2024.

events.name: Orientation Day
events.details: Orientation Day is a welcome event for new students to get familiar with the campus and college life. It includes campus tours, introductions to faculty and staff, and information about various student clubs and organizations.

events.name: Annual College Fest
events.details: The Annual College Fest is a celebration of talent and creativity, featuring music, dance, and various competitions. It is one of the most anticipated events of the year and attracts participants and visitors from neighboring colleges.

events.name: Sports Meet
events.details: The Sports Meet is an intercollegiate event where athletes from various colleges compete in a range of sports. It promotes sportsmanship, teamwork, and healthy competition among participants.

research_history: Founded in 1975, ABC University has a rich research history in fields like Science, Technology, and Medicine. It has been a pioneer in groundbreaking research and has published numerous influential research papers.

sports.name: Football
sports.details: Football is a popular sport at ABC University, and the college team competes in various leagues and tournaments. The team has a strong training program and is coached by experienced professionals.

sports.name: Basketball
sports.details: The college basketball team has a strong legacy of winning championships and hosts exciting matches throughout the season. It attracts a dedicated fanbase and is known for its competitive spirit.

details: ABC University is a prestigious institution known for its academic excellence and state-of-the-art facilities. It offers a wide range of undergraduate and graduate programs to students from around the world. The university prioritizes research and encourages students to engage in various extracurricular activities for personal and professional development.
